title: Land Registry squarish sans
content:
[http://www.movingbrands.com/assets/uploades/\_wrc73xdk.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072030/http:/www.movingbrands.com/assets/uploades/_wrc73xdk.jpg "http://www.movingbrands.com/assets/uploades/\_wrc73xdk.jpg")

Anyone know this one?

 [‹ "Visible evidence" grunged-out sans caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072030/http:/typophile.com/node/42701 "Go to previous forum topic") [Carat header font - Semi-slab serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072030/http:/typophile.com/node/42786 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cuidado

comments.content:
Dalton Maag made the fonts and logo for Land Registry

[http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/commissioning/case\_studies/land\_registry...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072030/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/about/commissioning/case_studies/land_registry.html "http://www.daltonmaag.com/about/commissioning/case\_studies/land\_registry.html")
Ahaa, why didnt i think of that. Thanks!

But I think the one you have isn’t the same as the current logo and font. Not sure I just checked and the ’R’ and ’i’ aren’t the same. But we can’t find any old logos for the Land Registry

[www.landregistry.gov.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072030/http:/www.landregistry.gov.uk/ "www.landregistry.gov.uk")

I checked their site, didnt see it. I guess maybe Dalton Maag did the type while North ( [www.northdesign.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072030/http:/www.northdesign.co.uk/ "www.northdesign.co.uk")) did the symbol and art direction. I might be wrong, though :)
